Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:SetText("Music List
 Left-Click: Open MusicList.
 Middle-Click: Stop playing music.
 Right-Click: Play a random song.
 Mouse-Wheel: Change music volume.")

FontString.name: ML_NameFS
FontString.text: Name the file's going to be listed.
